project.name: skylinkjs
project.description: SkylinkJS is an open-source client-side library for your web-browser that enables any website to easily leverage the capabilities of WebRTC and its direct data streaming powers between peers for audio/video conferencing or file transfer.

Skylink.name: Skylink
Skylink.description:
Please refer to the {{#crossLink "Skylink/init:method"}}init(){{/crossLink}} method for a guide to initializing Skylink.
Please Note: - You must subscribe Skylink events before calling {{#crossLink "Skylink/init:method"}}init(){{/crossLink}}. - You will need an API key to use Skylink, if you do not have one you can [register for a developer account](http:// developer.temasys.com.sg) in the Skylink Developer Console.

classitems.description: The list of ICE Connection states that would be triggered.
classitems.name: ICE_CONNECTION_STATE

params.name: STARTING
params.description:
The ICE agent is gathering addresses
  and/or waiting for remote candidates to be supplied.

params.name: CHECKING
params.description:
The ICE agent has received remote candidates
  on at least one component, and is checking candidate pairs but has
  not yet found a connection. In addition to checking, it may also
  still be gathering.

params.name: CONNECTED
params.description:
The ICE agent has found a usable connection
  for all components but is still checking other candidate pairs to see
  if there is a better connection. It may also still be gathering.

params.name: COMPLETED
params.description:
The ICE agent has finished gathering and
  checking and found a connection for all components.

params.name: FAILED
params.description:
The ICE agent is finished checking all
  candidate pairs and failed to find a connection for at least one
  component.

params.name: DISCONNECTED
params.description:
Liveness checks have failed for one or
  more components. This is more aggressive than "failed", and may
  trigger intermittently (and resolve itself without action) on
  a flaky network.

params.name: CLOSED
params.description:
The ICE agent has shut down and is no
  longer responding to STUN requests.

classitems.description: Update/Set the User custom data. This Data can be a simple string or a JSON data. It is let to user choice to decide how this information must be handled. The Skylink demos provided use this parameter as a string for displaying user name. - Please note that the custom data would be totally overwritten. - If you want to modify only some data, please call {{#crossLink "Skylink/getUserData:method"}}getUserData(){{/crossLink}} and then modify the information you want individually. - {{#crossLink "Skylink/peerUpdated:event"}}peerUpdated{{/crossLink}} event fires only if setUserData() is called after joining a room.

  execution.

params.name: JOIN_ROOM
params.description: Send to initiate the connection to the Room.

params.name: ENTER
params.description:
Broadcasts to any Peers connected to the room to
   intiate a Peer connection.

params.name: WELCOME
params.description:
Send as a response to Peer's enter received. User starts creating
   offer to the Peer.

params.description: Send when createOffer is completed and generated.

params.description: Send as a response to Peer's offer Message after createAnswer is called.

params.name: CANDIDATE
params.description: Send when an ICE Candidate is generated.

params.name: BYE
params.description: Received as a response from server that a Peer has left the Room.

params.name: REDIRECT
params.description:
Received as a warning from server when User is rejected or
  is jamming the server.

params.name: UPDATE_USER
params.description:
Broadcast when a User's information is updated to reflect the
  the changes on Peer's end.

params.name: GROUP
params.description:
Messages are bundled together when messages are sent too fast to
  prevent server redirects over sending less than 1 second interval.

props.name: weight
props.description:
The priority weight of the message. This is required when two Peers receives each other's welcome message, hence disrupting the handshaking to be incorrect. With a generated weight usually done by invoking Date.UTC(), this would check against the received weight and generated weight for the Peer to prioritize who should create or receive the offer.
  • >=0 An ongoing weight priority check is going on.Weight priority message.
  • -1 Enforce create offer to happen without any priority weight check.
  • -2 Enforce create offer and re-creating of Peer connection to happen without any priority weight check.

classitems.description:
The list of available Video Codecs.
- Note that setting this video codec does not mean that it will be
  the primary codec used for the call as it may vary based on the offerer's
  codec set.
- The available video codecs are:
classitems.name: VIDEO_CODEC

params.name: AUTO
params.description: The default option. This means to use any video codec given by generated sdp.

params.name: VP8
params.description: Use the VP8 video codec. This is the common and mandantory video codec used.

params.name: H264
params.description: Use the H264 video codec. This only works if the browser supports H264.

classitems.description:
The list of available Audio Codecs.
- Note that setting this audio codec does not mean that it will be
  the primary codec used for the call as it may vary based on the offerer's
  codec set.
- The available audio codecs are:
classitems.name: AUDIO_CODEC

params.name: AUTO
params.description: The default option. This means to use any audio codec given by generated sdp.

params.name: OPUS
params.description:
Use the OPUS audio codec.
  This is the common and mandantory audio codec used. This codec supports stereo.

params.name: ISAC
params.description:
Use the ISAC audio codec.
  This only works if the browser supports ISAC. This codec is mono based.

classitems.description:
Enable microphone.
- Try to start the audio source.
- If no audio source was initialy set, this function has no effect.
- If you want to activate your audio but haven't initially enabled it you would need to
  reinitiate your connection with
  {{#crossLink "Skylink/joinRoom:method"}}joinRoom(){{/crossLink}}
  process and set the audio parameter to true.
classitems.name: enableAudio
example: SkylinkDemo.enableAudio();

classitems.description:
Disable microphone.
- Try to disable the microphone.
- If no microphone was initially set, this function has no effect.
classitems.name: disableAudio
example: SkylinkDemo.disableAudio();

classitems.description:
Enable webcam video.
- Try to start the video source.
- If no video source was initialy set, this function has no effect.
- If you want to activate your video but haven't initially enabled it you would need to
  reinitiate your connection with
  {{#crossLink "Skylink/joinRoom:method"}}joinRoom(){{/crossLink}}
  process and set the video parameter to true.
classitems.name: enableVideo
example: SkylinkDemo.enableVideo();

classitems.description:
Disable video source.
- Try to disable the video source.
- If no video source was initially set, this function has no effect.
classitems.name: disableVideo
example: SkylinkDemo.disableVideo();

classitems.description:
Shares the current screen with users.
- You will require our own Temasys Skylink extension to do screensharing.
  Currently, opera does not support this feature.
classitems.name: shareScreen

params.name: callback
params.description:
The callback fired after media was successfully accessed.
  Default signature: function(error object, success object)

classitems.description: Stops screensharing MediaStream playback and streaming.
classitems.name: stopScreen
example: SkylinkDemo.stopScreen();

classitems.description:
Enables the stereo feature by modifying the SDP. This requires the OPUS
to be enabled in the connection first.
classitems.name: _addSDPStereo

params.name: sdpLines
params.description: Sdp received.

classitems.description:
Sets the video resolution by modifying the SDP.
- This is broken.
classitems.name: _setSDPVideoResolution

params.name: sdpLines
params.description: Sdp received.

return.description: Updated version with custom Resolution settings

classitems.description:
Set the audio, video and data streamming bandwidth by modifying the SDP.
It sets the bandwidth when the connection is good. In low bandwidth environment,
the bandwidth is managed by the browser.
classitems.name: _setSDPBitrate

params.name: sdpLines
params.description: The session description received.
